properties.entry: UPDATE POST SET POST_VIEWS = POST_VIEWS + 1 WHERE BLIND_CHECK = 'N' AND POST_NO = ?
UPDATE GROUPBUY_QUESTION SET GQ_VIEWS = GQ_VIEWS + 1 WHERE GQ_NO = ? AND GQ_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) "LISTCOUNT" FROM groupbuy_question

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT POST_NO , GQ_NO , MEM_USERID , GQ_TITLE , GQ_VIEWS , GQ_ENROLLDATE FROM GROUPBUY_QUESTION JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE GQ_STATUS = 'Y' AND POST_NO = ? ORDER BY GQ_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO GROUPBUY_QUESTION ( GQ_NO , POST_NO , GQ_TITLE , GQ_CONTENT , MEM_NO , GQ_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_GQNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , 'Y' )
SELECT GQ_NO , GQ_TITLE , MEM_NAME , GQ_ENROLLDATE , GQ_CONTENT FROM GROUPBUY_QUESTION JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE GQ_STATUS = 'Y' AND GQ_NO = ?
UPDATE GROUPBUY_QUESTION SET GQ_TITLE = ? , GQ_CONTENT = ? WHERE GQ_NO = ?
UPDATE GROUPBUY_QUESTION SET GQ_STATUS = 'N' WHERE GQ_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT GQ_NO , MEM_USERID , GQ_TITLE , GQ_VIEWS , GQ_ENROLLDATE FROM GROUPBUY_QUESTION JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE GQ_STATUS = 'Y' AND POST_NO = ? ORDER BY GQ_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT THUMBNAIL_LOADPATH , POST_NAME FROM POST WHERE POST_NO=?

INSERT INTO POST ( POST_NO , CATEGORY_NO , MEM_NO , LOCAL_NO , MEM_NICKNAME , POST_NAME , POST_COMMENT , CATEGORY_NAME , PROD_STATUS , DEAL_TYPE , SITE , THUMBNAIL_PATH , THUMBNAIL_FILENAME , THUMBNAIL_LOADPATH , POST_VIEWS , POST_REPORTS , POST_LIKES , PROD_PRICE , POST_ENROLL_DATE , POST_TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ( SELECT LOCAL_NO FROM LOCATION WHERE LOCAL_SI=? AND LOCAL_GU=? AND LOCAL_DONG=? ) , ? , ? , ? ,(SELECT CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_NO=?) , DEFAULT , 'C' , '서울' , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , 1 , SYSDATE , 2 )
INSERT INTO GROUP_PURCHASE ( POST_NO , GP_DEADLINE , GP_MINPEOPLE , GP_PRICE , GP_DRATE , GP_DPRICE , GP_STATUS , GP_REFUND ) VALUES ( SEQ_PNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 'Y' , ? )
INSERT INTO LOCATION ( LOCAL_NO ) VALUES ( ( SELECT LOCAL_NO FROM LOCATION WHERE LOCAL_SI=? AND LOCAL_GU=? AND LOCAL_DONG=? ) )
INSERT INTO PROD_OPTION ( OPTION_NO , POST_NO , OPTION_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_PONO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_PNO.CURRVAL , ? )
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT ( POST_NO , ACCOUNT , BANK ) VALUES ( SEQ_PNO.CURRVAL , SEQ_ACNO.NEXTVAL , ? )
INSERT INTO PHOTO ( PHOTO_NO , POST_NO , PHOTO_PATH , PHOTO_FILENAME , PHOTO_LOADPATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_IMGNO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_PNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) "LISTCOUNT" FROM GROUP_PURCHASE
SELECT POST_NO , POST_NAME , POST_COMMENT , THUMBNAIL_PATH , THUMBNAIL_FILENAME , THUMBNAIL_LOADPATH FROM POST WHERE POST_NO = ?

SELECT POST_NO , POST_ENROLL_DATE , TO_CHAR(GP_DEADLINE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GP_DEADLINE , GP_PRICE , GP_DRATE , GP_MINPEOPLE , GP_PEOPLE , GP_DPRICE , GP_REFUND FROM GROUP_PURCHASE LEFT JOIN POST USING(POST_NO) WHERE POST_NO = ? AND POST_TYPE = 2
SELECT LOCAL_GU , LOCAL_DONG FROM LOCATION JOIN POST USING(LOCAL_NO) WHERE POST_NO = ?
SELECT OPTION_NO , OPTION_NAME FROM PROD_OPTION WHERE POST_NO = ?
SELECT BANK FROM ACCOUNT WHERE POST_NO = ?
SELECT POST_NO , PHOTO_PATH , PHOTO_FILENAME , PHOTO_LOADPATH FROM PHOTO WHERE POST_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT POST_NO , THUMBNAIL_PATH , THUMBNAIL_FILENAME , THUMBNAIL_LOADPATH , POST_NAME , GP_PEOPLE , POST_LIKES , GP_PRICE , GP_DRATE , GP_DPRICE FROM GROUP_PURCHASE JOIN POST USING (POST_NO) WHERE BLIND_CHECK = 'N' AND POST_TYPE = 2 ORDER BY POST_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE POST SET POST_LIKES = POST_LIKES + 1 WHERE POST_NO=?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE MEM_NO=? AND REPORT_POST_NO=?
UPDATE POST SET POST_REPORTS = POST_REPORTS + 1 WHERE POST_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM ,A.* FROM ( SELECT POST_NO ,LIKECOUNT ,MEM_NO ,LOCAL_NO ,POST_NAME ,CATEGORY_NAME ,THUMBNAIL_PATH ,THUMBNAIL_FILENAME ,THUMBNAIL_LOADPATH ,POST_VIEWS ,POST_LIKES ,PROD_PRICE ,PROD_STATUS ,BLIND_CHECK ,POST_TYPE FROM ( SELECT P.POST_NO ,COUNT(L.POST_NO) LIKECOUNT FROM LIKE_POST L RIGHT JOIN POST P ON(P.POST_NO=L.POST_NO) GROUP BY P.POST_NO ) JOIN POST USING (POST_NO) WHERE PROD_STATUS = 'Y' AND BLIND_CHECK = 'N' AND POST_TYPE=2 ORDER BY POST_NO DESC) A JOIN LOCATION L ON(A.LOCAL_NO=L.LOCAL_NO) ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND POST_NAME LIKE ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM ,A.* FROM ( SELECT POST_NO ,LIKECOUNT ,MEM_NO ,LOCAL_NO ,POST_NAME ,CATEGORY_NAME ,THUMBNAIL_PATH ,THUMBNAIL_FILENAME ,THUMBNAIL_LOADPATH ,POST_VIEWS ,POST_LIKES ,PROD_PRICE ,PROD_STATUS ,BLIND_CHECK ,POST_TYPE FROM ( SELECT P.POST_NO ,COUNT(L.POST_NO) LIKECOUNT FROM LIKE_POST L RIGHT JOIN POST P ON(P.POST_NO=L.POST_NO) GROUP BY P.POST_NO ) JOIN POST USING (POST_NO) WHERE PROD_STATUS = 'Y' AND BLIND_CHECK = 'N' AND POST_TYPE=2
ORDER BY POST_NO DESC) A JOIN LOCATION L ON(A.LOCAL_NO=L.LOCAL_NO) ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND CATEGORY_NAME LIKE ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT POST_NO , THUMBNAIL_PATH , THUMBNAIL_FILENAME , THUMBNAIL_LOADPATH , POST_NAME , GP_PEOPLE , POST_LIKES , GP_PRICE , GP_DRATE , GP_DPRICE FROM GROUP_PURCHASE JOIN POST USING (POST_NO) WHERE BLIND_CHECK = 'N' AND POST_TYPE = 2 ORDER BY POST_ENROLL_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT POST_NO , THUMBNAIL_PATH , THUMBNAIL_FILENAME , THUMBNAIL_LOADPATH , POST_NAME , GP_PEOPLE , POST_LIKES , GP_PRICE , GP_DRATE , GP_DPRICE FROM GROUP_PURCHASE JOIN POST USING (POST_NO) WHERE BLIND_CHECK = 'N' AND POST_TYPE = 2 ORDER BY GP_DPRICE ASC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT POST_NO , THUMBNAIL_PATH , THUMBNAIL_FILENAME , THUMBNAIL_LOADPATH , POST_NAME , GP_PEOPLE , POST_LIKES , GP_PRICE , GP_DRATE , GP_DPRICE FROM GROUP_PURCHASE JOIN POST USING (POST_NO) WHERE BLIND_CHECK = 'N' AND POST_TYPE = 2 ORDER BY POST_LIKES DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

AND ?

AND ?

AND ?

AND LOCAL_DONG=? ) ORDER BY POST_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
